definitions: Collides violently with an obstacle or another vehicle.
Fails suddenly and completely (of a computer system or program).
Attends an event or stays at a place without invitation or permission.
Goes to sleep, especially in an informal or temporary place.
examples: The car crashes into the barrier.
My computer crashes every time I open that application.
He crashes parties all the time.
She crashes on her friend's couch when she visits.
